name: Sugar Blast: Sweet Collapse
description:
Sugar Blast is an entertaining, exciting Match 3 Game and it keeps the spirit of the adventure!

Just match the sugars of the same color and reach the new addictive levels!

Hundreds of unique challenges…

Try using boosters for the extraordinary moves. Combining the boosters? Even powerful! Hurry and unlock the boosters to blast your way to the next level!

With each new level, you’ll get more skills to become a candy master!

Features:
● Creatively and deliberately designed hundreds of levels!
● Engaging graphic design & animations!
● Free & easy to play, challenging to master!
● Share your scores and dare your friends
● Leaderboards that lets you compete with everyone

Have fun!
